Create your own writer¶

To create your own writer, inherit from barcode.writer.BaseWriter. In your __init__ method call BaseWriter’s __init__ and give your callbacks for initialize(raw_code), paint_module(xpos, ypos, width, color), paint_text(xpos, ypos) and finish().

Now instatiate a new barcode and give an instance of your new writer as argument. If you now call render on the barcode instance your callbacks get called.
